message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that price.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident in the value this product offers. Let's meet in the middle at $1,350,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000, but that's as high as I can go.
